Regarding Wuhan pneumonia, a family of physicians in Wuhan City claimed on March 9 that another outbreak has occurred in several apartments in Hanyang, the city. In response to an interview with the New Tangjin TV, a satellite broadcaster of the Dakiyuan Media Group,
